blockquote.p: "It is our mission to educate and inspire all students to achieve academic and social growth that leads to a successful future."

div.span: See the RAPS Continuity of Learning Plan and Educational resources for students and parents k-12 for learning while at home.

The Roscommon Area Public Schools will hold its regular monthly meeting on Tuesday, April 21st at 6:00 p.m. Pursuant to Executive Order 2020-48, the meeting will be held virtually. The public will be able to call on the phone to hear the meeting. There will be time for public comment at the end of the meeting. The public may either email questions to the Board or ask questions from the phone. Instructions for calling into the meeting are on the attached agenda. People wishing to email the Board of Education members may do so at boe@rapsk12.net
RAPS distributes food for children via bus routes during closure.
See Superintendent Erickson's update regarding school closure for the remainder of the school year.
Roscommon County Food Resources thru mid April 2020
Locations for food pick up in Roscommon County.
See flyer for dates and pick up locations

p.br: Roscommon Area Public Schools supports an Outstanding Staff.
Roscommon Area Public Schools proudly supports many Exceptional programs.
Roscommon High School is proud to recognized Distinguished Alumni through this award.
Outstanding staff, Exceptional programs, Focus on Fine Arts, RAPS is your School of Choice.

div.p: We are continually working on creating and maintaining our documents in an accessible format for viewers of all abilities. If you are having issues, please feel free to contact us for an accessible format document or paper copy.
